titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Special Committee on Aging.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Special Committee on Aging.

action.text: Special Committee on Aging. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Kohl. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Special Committee on Aging for the 112th Congress.
